item.title: How do i make an ip ban command? u help and u can be mod on server
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

Well, I’ll give you a basic :

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ban”)&& playerRights >= 2){
appendToBanned(playerName);

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has been banned from the server.";
}[/code] You can find it out yourself now, you’ll learn something with it…

Read full topic
